ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:title: PTx Suppression Heating Test 2
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:description: Temperature probe measurements for heating at tip of wire 12 cm long copper wire in a polyacrylic acid cylindrical phantom (radius = 9 cm, height = 24 cm) using FRFSE sequence (TR = 559 ms, TE = 100 ms, echo train length = 24, 1 slice, imaging time = 4:08). Excitation with 4-element parallel transmit coil with phase shifts of 40, 16, 200 and 301 degrees (suppression mode) with a transmit gain of 187. Second measurement.
ns0:DryadDataFile.ns2:subject: Deep brain stimulation
magnetic resonance imaging
medical device safety
radiofrequency heating
parallel radiofrequency transmission
radiofrequency coils
electromagnetic modeling
